summary: Posing as an abandoned toddler, a very small fugitive (Marlon Wayans) from the law tricks a couple (Shawn Wayans, Kerry Washington) into taking him in. Once there, the baby-faced thief endures the other man's attempts at fatherhood while waiting for a chance to take back the stolen gem he hid in the wife's purse.

reviews.content: Ages 13 and older!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! LOL, the funniest 01 hour: and 38 minutes ever!!!!!!!!!!! In memory of John Witherspoon!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Little Man ist eine Filmkomödie von Keenen Ivory Wayans. Wer auf schwarzen Humor steht, wird diesen Film lieben. Ja Little Man ist ein alberner und extrem kitschiger Film, aber zugleich eine großartige Komödie, mit viel Lacher und jede Menge Action… Kaum zu glauben, der Film hat mich ausgezeichnet unterhalten, ja ich habe mit Little Man gelacht und gelacht, denn ich liebe diesen albernen schwarzen Humor.
One of the best comedy movies our family has seen, and even if you watch it time and time again, you will crack up. Other good ones are Death At A Funeral with Chris Rock.

Little Man is, of course, a stupid parody, but is not anywhere close to Epic Movie, Date Movie, Disaster Movie, Meet The Spartans, Superhero Movie, Stan Helsing, dang, not even Scary Movie. There are countless funny moments in this movie, no stupid gags like Scary Movie 5. The plot is creative, and I just loved it. It is currently on Netflix, it is a funny, must watch.

This impossibly fatuous, crass and obnoxiously unfunny joke of a movie is quite possibly the worst I've ever made myself sit through. The lazy, infantile writing is truly abhorrent (let's not forget to mention that sexual assault and harassment are played for laughs), the performers should all be sentenced for crimes against the acting profession and the Wayan brothers, plague that they are to mainstream comedy cinema, should be forever blacklisted from Hollywood. I've never been so offended or insulted by the existence of a movie as I have this piece of vomit inducing rubbish.

Two crooks, one being only four feet tall, rob a jewelry place and steal a diamond. The diamond ends up in another ladies purse. So being small he pretends he's a baby and his partner leaves him at the ladies doorstep. The wayons bros. have a pretty good comedy here. Defiantly keeps you laughing from beginning to end. Defiantly has an interesting story with most of the actors being funny and keeping you still interested in the movie.  Defiant check this one out if you want some good laughs. It will defiantly give you them through pretty much most of the movie. This is a great laugh out loud comedy.

"Little Man" is a stupid comedy, stupid because the jokes are cheap, the premise is ridiculous and because the film makers think that audiences will be stupid enough to buy into the film. Even if you are able to buy that a grown man could trick people into thinking that, because of his short height he is a baby/toddler, the filmmakers make the huge mistake of actually showing him alongside real babies, which completely destroys the illusion and makes you wonder how stupid these characters are. The jokes consist mostly of crotch shots, lame sex jokes (including a scene where "Calvin" pretends to be "Vanessa's" husband during the middle of the night so they can have sex, which is rape, not a joke) and characters looking bug eyed as a little man that is supposed to pass off as a small child does inappropriate things. It may have a few lonely laughs here and there, but this is a movie that's so stupid it's offensive. (Dvd, November 23, 2012)

A live action Looney Toon Cartoon, complete with soundtrack from old looney toon shorts. A few chuckles here and there but for the most part a huge waste of time. This film really magnifies how bad of an actor Shawn Wayans is. The strongest performance comes from John Witherspoon and Tracy Morgan. Other then that..skip, unless you need to entertain your neighbors kid for a few hours...
